Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Note: "UV-visible absorption spectra" and "synthesized polymers" are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties. "Chloroform solution" could be considered a material or a medium, but it is included here as it directly relates to the property of the polymers in question. "The UV-visible absorption spectra" refers to a specific measurement or test of the material property, and "Figure 2" refers to a representation of the data related to the property.
